meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Turner Tucker Pope Julia Clark Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6774.

td.p: Eric Turner, a senior from Vanderbilt University from Huntsville, Alabama
Tucker Pope, a junior from Texas A&M University from Lubbock, Texas
Julia Clark, a senior at Harvard University from Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Canada

tr.td: (Alex: And finally, we'll give it the old college "tree", not "try", even though it's spelled T-R-Y. )

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Tucker: What is the International
Monetary Foundation?)

The World Bank

JuliaTucker
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
JuliaWhat is Arlington National Cemetery?
$6,799
TuckerWhat is Arlington National Cemetery?
$2,185
EricWhat is Arlington Cemetery?
$1
Arlington National Cemetery')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Administered by the Army, its first graves were dug by former slave James Parks, the only one buried there who was born on the site')

tr.td: Administered by the Army, its first graves were dug by former slave James Parks, the only one buried there who was born on the site
